title: Sleeping With Her Rival
description: SHE PLAYED WITH THE BIG BOYS IN THE BOARDROOM....But with rival Flint Kingman, had PR exec Gina Barone met her match in the bedroom? The wealthy, cocky spin doctor, hired against her wishes, forced her into a pretend affair to divert the media from her family's business scandal. For as long as it took, their red-hot "liaison" would burn up the Boston tabloids.Powerless to resist, Gina entered Flint's world of erotic fantasy, where he called the shots...where his raw, primal heat threatened to melt her ice-princess heart. In her adversary's arms -- with his bed mere inches away -- the pretend affair suddenly felt all too real....
author: Sheri Whitefeather
